translations: n.方济各·撒肋爵的信徒；慈幼会教徒

phrs.translation: 慈幼会, 方济各·撒肋爵的信徒
慈幼英文学校, 慈幼英文中学
塞尔思恩学院, 慈幼会学院, 骚尔先学院

sentences.sentence: The Salesian Images collection is one of the fastest growing of the collections.
sentences.translation: 慈幼会图像资料库，为其中一项快速增长的项目。

sentences.sentence: They are materials used in training lay people in Salesian principles, Preventive System and Assistance.
sentences.translation: 这些有关于慈幼会宗旨、预防教育法和支援的材料，主要用以培育平信徒。

sentences.sentence: Railway police in Assam have set up a team to probe the mysterious disappearance of a Salesian priest from a train four days ago.
sentences.translation: 【天亚社。印度古哈瓦蒂讯】为调查四天前在火车上神秘失踪的慈幼会神父，印度阿萨姆邦铁路警察组织了一个调查小组。
